name: QWERTY Ninja: The Quest For Alex The Golden Chicken
name_original: QWERTY Ninja: The Quest For Alex The Golden Chicken
description:
QWERTY Ninja: The Quest For Alex The Golden Chicken is a game developed by HungryDev. It was originally released in 2020.
You can play QWERTY Ninja: The Quest For Alex The Golden Chicken on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
